sources.title: The Last of the Mohicans (1932) HARRY CAREYüçï12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
12-CHAPTER SERIAL MARATHON!
Starring: Harry Carey, Hobart Bosworth, Frank Coghlan Jr.
Written by: James Fenimore Cooper (Novel)
Directed by: Ford Beebe & B. Reeves Eason

This thrilling Mascot serial takes place in colonial America 1757, during the final French and Indian War. The Hurons, allies of the French, are on the warpath. Harry Carey stars as the famous scout Hawkeye.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
01:08     CHAPTER 1: Wild Waters
32:02     CHAPTER 2: Flaming Arrows
49:55     CHAPTER 3: Rifle or Tomahawk
1:06:45  CHAPTER 4: Riding with Death
1:26:48  CHAPTER 5: Red Shadows
1:42:33  CHAPTER 6: Lure of Gold
2:00:58  CHAPTER 7: Crimson Trail
2:18:04  CHAPTER 8: Tide of Battle
2:35:17  CHAPTER 9: Redskins' Honor
2:53:37  CHAPTER 10: The Enemy's Stronghold
3:13:18  CHAPTER 11: Paleface Magic
3:32:40  CHAPTER 12: End of the Trail
3:49:32  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: Natty Bumppo, known as Hawk-Eye, is a frontiersman in the American wilderness. Together with his Indian friends Chingachgook and Uncas, he fights battles against nefarious white soldiers as well as the vicious Indian Magua and his cohorts.
metadata.Writer: James Fenimore Cooper, Colbert Clark, Jack Natteford
metadata.Actors: Harry Carey, Hobart Bosworth, Frank Coghlan Jr.
